name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James Leslie COOK, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James Leslie COOK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as being improvidently granted, 277 Pa.Super.-, 419 A.2d 707.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Paul J. Dellasega and Ira H. Weinstock, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Michael Eakin, Asst. Dist. Atty., Carlisle, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 881
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James Leslie COOK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 26, 1980.
Decided Jan. 30, 1981.
Paul J. Dellasega and Ira H. Weinstock, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Michael Eakin, Asst. Dist. Atty., Carlisle, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
